item.title: Matonge Travel Guide (Brussels/Belgium/Benelux/Europe)
item.description: Matonge is a lively neighborhood in Brussels that is popular for its urban culture, nightlife, and Afro-European vibe. Read this guide to plan your trip to Matonge, including places to visit, hiking/biking routes, food and drink scene, where to stay, local culture, safety tips, and more.
